txt.en: Hlóthi is in Zarkul-sulûn, in southern Elderslade.\n\nReturn to Hlóthi.
'The Orcs have littered the battlefield with siege engines, [placeholder]. I need you to destroy as many as you can before they are able to turn the deadly machines upon our forces.'
'Hah! That put a dent in their helms, didn't it?'
'The war machines of the enemy must be destroyed.'
Enemy siege engines throughout the War of Three Peaks must be destroyed.
March on Gundabad: Siege Upon Siege Engines
Siege engines can be found throughout the War of Three Peaks.\n\nHlóthi has tasked you with destroying enemy siege engines.
